src_original: 3 kāśyapa catvāro dharmā bodhisatvasya prajñāpārihāṇāya saṃvartate /  tatredam ucyate // agauravo
tgt_original: 有四法能退失智慧。 菩薩所應遠離。 何等為四。

src_original: 4 bhavati ca dharmabhāṇake dharmeṣu mātsaryarato ca bhoti /  ācāryamuṣṭiṃ ca karoti dharme dharmārthikānā
tgt_original: 一不敬法及說法者。 二於要法祕匿悋惜。

src_original: 5 ca karoti vighnam* vicchandayanto vividhaṃ kṣipanto dharmaṃ na deśayati jinapraśastān* so ātma utkarṣaṇi
tgt_original: 三樂法者為作障礙壞其聽心。

src_original: fol. 2v (KP-SI P/2)  1 nityayukto parapaṃsane cābhirataḥ kusīdo /
caturo ime dharmā jinena proktā prajñāprahāṇāya
tgt_original: 復有四法。 得其智慧。

src_original: 4 yaduta sagauravo bhavati dharme ca dharmabhāṇake ca /  yathāśrutāṃś ca dharmān yathāparyāptān  5 parebhyo vistareṇa saṃprakāśayati /
tgt_original: 一恭敬法及說法者。 二如所聞法及所讀誦為他人說其心清淨不求利養。
